apps.name: DolphiniOS
apps.subtitle: GameCube and Wii games on the go.
apps.localizedDescription:
DolphiniOS is a port of the popular Dolphin emulator to iOS. Dolphin lets you play your favourite GameCube and Wii software with enhancements like higher resolutions, save states, and more. You can even play all of Nintendo's classics from past consoles through the Wii's Virtual Console library.

Please note that devices with A8 processors and older are not compatible.

versions.localizedDescription:
This update contains the following changes:

- Fixed ubershaders.
- Fixed fastmem crashing on iOS 16.

Please update DolphiniOS to version 3.2.1 before attempting to use it on iOS 16.

apps.versionDescription:
This update contains the following changes:

- Fixed ubershaders.
- Fixed fastmem crashing on iOS 16.

Please update DolphiniOS to version 3.2.1 before attempting to use it on iOS 16.

apps.name: DolphiniOS (Public Beta)
apps.subtitle: Test the latest DolphiniOS.
apps.localizedDescription:
DolphiniOS is a port of the popular Dolphin emulator to iOS. Dolphin lets you play your favourite GameCube and Wii software with enhancements like higher resolutions, save states, and more. You can even play all of Nintendo's classics from past consoles through the Wii's Virtual Console library.

Please note that devices with A8 processors and older are not compatible.

versions.localizedDescription:
This is the second public beta build based on the rewritten DolphiniOS code.

iOS 14 is required to run this build.

This is the first build based on the rewritten DolphiniOS code.

iOS 14 is required to run this build.

This update contains the following changes:

- Fixed ubershaders.
- Fixed fastmem crashing on iOS 16 betas.

The next beta build will be based off the rewritten DolphiniOS source code.

apps.versionDescription:
This is the second public beta build based on the rewritten DolphiniOS code.

iOS 14 is required to run this build.

apps.name: PojavLauncher
apps.subtitle: Bringing Minecraft: Java Edition to mobile devices.
apps.versionDescription: PojavLauncher 2.2 Deepslate puts a focus on our core functionality, working to squash bugs, improve performance, and increase reliability.
apps.localizedDescription:
PojavLauncher is a Minecraft: Java Edition launcher for iOS and Android based on the Boardwalk project.

â¢ Play most versions of Minecraft, from the very first beta to the latest snapshots.
â¢ Customize with mods, resource packs, and compatible shaders
â¢ Create multiple instances of Minecraft for multiple versions
â¢ Adjust on-screen controls to your liking, or use keyboard and mouse or controllers
â¢ Play online with full Java Edition servers
...and so much more!

Notice: PojavLauncher iOS requires JIT to function correctly. This application automatically enables JIT with JITStreamer, TrollStore, or when jailbroken, however other methods can be used if required.

apps.name: Provenance EMU
apps.subtitle: Multi-emulator frontend for iOS & tvOS
apps.versionDescription: Pre-release of Play!, Dolphin and PPSSPP. JIT Required or cores will crash.
apps.localizedDescription: Multi-emulator frontend, supporting various Atari, Bandai, NEC, Nintendo, Sega, SNK and Sony console systems.

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Provenance to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: emuThreeDS
apps.subtitle: Nintendo 3DS emulator for iOS.
apps.localizedDescription: emuThreeDS is a Nintendo 3DS emulator for Apple TV, iPad and iPhone based on Citra.

versions.localizedDescription:
# v1.0.6.5 (6) is now out!

See **[CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/emuplace/emuthreeds/blob/main/resources/markdowns/CHANGELOG.md)** for more information.

# Settings galore, Full controller support, Latest Vulkan and more!

See **[CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/emuPlace/emuThreeDS/blob/main/resources/markdowns/CHANGELOG.md)** for more information.

This will be the last SwiftUI release as the project is moving back to Swift.

# Added new virtual controller buttons and added new settings.

Change-logs will go back to normal from here on out... I've not kept track properly for this version.

apps.name: citra
apps.subtitle: Citra Nintendo 3DS emulator for iOS.
apps.localizedDescription: Citra is a Nintendo 3DS emulator. This is a fork specifically compiled for iOS devices and is still in its early stages of development. You should not expect the same compatibility and performance that you might expect of the PC version of Citra.

versions.localizedDescription:
# iOS (α) CI.4865233241

* Tell compiler to support only A12 or later CPU, but I'm not sure this actually improves performance

## NOTE
* This version requires A12 or later device (iPhone XS/XR or later)
  * this is coming from GPU requirements (we need layered rendering)
* This version can install to iOS 14 or later device, but...
  * We only supports latest stable iOS.
  * in iOS 14.x or older, you can't use virtual controller (which means you need to use external controller, like DS4 or Xbox or MFi certificated controller)
* This version doesn't supporting these features:
  * Audio Input (Mic)
  * Camera
  * Motion Sensor
  * Touch Screen
  * NFC
  * SELECT/HOME button for physical controller
  * Circle Pad (including Pro), ZL/ZR, SELECT/START/HOME button for virtual controller

apps.name: WDBRemoveThreeAppLimit
apps.subtitle: Removes three app limit from AltStore!
apps.localizedDescription:
An app that removes the three app limit for free provisioning. Hit "Go" just before installing apps. Should work on iOS 16.1.2 and below / iOS 15.7.1 and below.

This is very limited:

• Apps still expire after a week
• They still do not get arbitrary entitlements
• They still must be signed. It's probably not going to be that useful. It's meant more as a demo of what you can do with MacDirtyCow.

versions.localizedDescription: • Updated WDBRemoveThreeAppLimit to v1.0

apps.name: WDBFontOverwrite
apps.subtitle: Override the iOS system fonts!
apps.localizedDescription: An app that allows you to override the system used iOS font with one of the fonts from our built in selection. It's probably not going to be that useful. It's meant more as a demo of what you can do with MacDirtyCow.

versions.localizedDescription:
# v1.10.8

- Updated grant_full_disk_access.
- Concurrency and code improvements/fixes.

apps.name: Deltroid
apps.subtitle: Multi-emulator for your classic games on the go!
apps.localizedDescription:
Deltroid is an all-in-one emulator for iOS. Deltroid builds upon the strengths of its predecessor Delta while improving on it in a community supported fashion. 

Github Repository (https://github.com/lonkelle/Deltroid) 

FEATURES

Supported Game Systems
• Nintendo Entertainment System
• Super Nintendo Entertainment System
• Nintendo 64
• Game Boy (Color)
• Game Boy Advance
• Nintendo DS
• Nintendo DSi
• Sega Genesis
• And plenty more to come!

Controller Support
• Supports PS4, PS5, Xbox One S, Xbox Series X, and MFi game controllers.
• Supports bluetooth (and wired) keyboards, as well as the Apple Smart Keyboard.
• Completely customize button mappings on a per-system, per-controller basis.
• Map buttons to special “Quick Save”, “Quick Load,” and “Fast Forward” actions.

Save States
• Save and load save states for any game from the pause menu.
• Lock save states to prevent them from being accidentally overwritten.
• Automatically makes backup save states to ensure you never lose your progress.
• Support for “Quick Saves,” save states that can be quickly saved/loaded with a single button press (requires external controller).

Cheats
• Supports various types of cheat codes for each supported system:
• NES: Game Genie
• SNES: Game Genie, Pro Action Replay
• N64: GameShark
• GBC: Game Genie, GameShark
• GBA: Action Replay, Code Breaker, GameShark
• DS: Action Replay

Deltroid Sync
• Sync your games, game saves, save states, cheats, controller skins, and controller mappings between devices.
• View version histories of everything you sync and optionally restore them to earlier versions.
• Supports both Google Drive and Dropbox.

Custom Controller Skins
• Beautiful built-in controller skins for all systems.
• Import controller skins made by others, or even make your own to share with the world!

Hold Button
• Choose buttons for Delta to hold down on your behalf, freeing up your thumbs to press other buttons instead.
• Perfect for games that typically require one button be held down constantly (ex: run button in Mario games, or the A button in Mario Kart).

Fast Forward
• Speed through slower parts of games by running the game much faster than normal.
• Easily enable or disable from the pause menu, or optionally with a mapped button on an external controller.

3D/Haptic Touch
• Use 3D or Haptic Touch to “peek” at games, save states, and cheat codes.
• App icon shortcuts allow quick access to your most recently played games, or optionally customize the shortcuts to always include certain games.

Game Artwork
• Automatically displays appropriate box art for imported games.
• Change a game’s artwork to anything you want, or select from the built-in game artwork database.

Misc.
• Gyroscope support (WarioWare: Twisted! only)
• Microphone support (DS only)
• Support for delta:// URL scheme to jump directly into a specific game.

**Deltroid and Sidestore are in no way affiliated with Nintendo. The name "Nintendo" and all associated game console names are registered trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd.**

versions.localizedDescription:
# v0.9.1

• Fixes default NES / DS skins
• Fixes importing `.md` files from the in-app File Picker.
Additions and Bugfixes. More info: https://github.com/lonkelle/Deltroid/releases

apps.name: VCMI
apps.subtitle: Heroes of Might & Magic III engine
apps.localizedDescription:
VCMI is a open source cross-platform HoMM3 engine written from scratch. 

You need data copied from original game to play. 
Follow instructions from https://wiki.vcmi.eu/Installation_on_iOS

# VCMI 1.4.5

Warning: saved games from 1.3 release are not supported

### Changelog
* Fixed crash on creature spellcasting
* Fixed crash on unit entering magical obstacles such as quicksands
* Fixed freeze on map loading on some systems
* Fixed crash on attempt to start campaign with unsupported map
* Fixed crash on opening creature information window with invalid SPELL_IMMUNITY bonus
* Fixed placement of guards sometimes resulting into open connection into third zone
* Fixed rare crash on multithreaded access during placement of artifacts or wandering monsters
* Fixed inspector using wrong editor for some values
* Fixed bug leading to AI not attacking wandering monsters in some cases
* Fixed crash on using StupidAI for autocombat or for enemy players

apps.name: Delta iPac Edition
apps.subtitle: A sneak peek preview of Delta!
apps.localizedDescription: This version of Delta is essentially the base version of Delta, but with a large number of popular and highly anticipated Pull Requests merged in. Keep in mind there are some bugs and graphical glitches. Refer to https://github.com/ianclawson/Delta-iPac-Edition#readme for more details.

versions.localizedDescription:
# iPac Edition Official Release

Only the IPA is included. The "Source Code" is merely the README.

New Features:
* Optimized AirPlay Support
* Local Mulitplayer (NES, SNES, N64, GEN)
* Nintendo-Switch-Online-like Rewind
* Additional MFi Inputs (L3, R3, Options, Home, and some PS/Xbox-specific inputs)
* External Controller deadzones for analog inputs (allows analog sticks to work properly for d-pads)
* External Controller connection now prevents game screen from rotating
* SNES Audio no longer crackles
* Bonus: Quick Saves now Sync

apps.name: PPSSPP
apps.subtitle: PlayStation Portable games on iOS.
apps.localizedDescription: PPSSPP can run your PSP games on your iPhone and iPad in full HD resolution. It can even upscale textures that would otherwise be too blurry as they were made for the small screen of the original PSP. Even on modern iPhones and iPads, you can often run at double the original resolution.
